mbean.name: jboss:type=Service,name=RegwebSystemProperties
mbean.attribute:
#spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.dialect=es.caib.emiserv.persist.dialect.OracleCaibDialect #spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.dialect=es.caib.emiserv.persist.dialect.PostgreSqlCaibDialect
es.caib.emiserv.tasca.backoffice.async.processar.pendents=10000 es.caib.emiserv.xsd.base.path=/opt/apps/emiserv/xsd
es.caib.emiserv.servei.SERVEI_CODI.usuari= es.caib.emiserv.servei.SERVEI_CODI.contrasenya=
es.caib.emiserv.scsp.cif.emisor=123456789Z es.caib.emiserv.scsp.nombre.emisor=LÃ­mit Tecnologies es.caib.emiserv.scsp.logDinamico.enabled=true es.caib.emiserv.scsp.core_log.enabled=true es.caib.emiserv.scsp.nivelTraza=INFO es.caib.emiserv.scsp.pathLogs=/opt/apps/emiserv/logs es.caib.emiserv.scsp.almacenamiento.ficheros=/opt/apps/emiserv/scsp es.caib.emiserv.scsp.almacenamiento.transmisiones=1 es.caib.emiserv.scsp.afirma.enabled=false es.caib.emiserv.scsp.afirma.url=none es.caib.emiserv.scsp.afirma.idAplicacion=none es.caib.emiserv.scsp.afirma.modoValidacion=none es.caib.emiserv.scsp.afirma.autenticacion.aliasSignerCert=none es.caib.emiserv.scsp.keystoreType=jks es.caib.emiserv.scsp.keystoreFile=file:/opt/apps/emiserv/config/keystores/interoperabilitat.jks es.caib.emiserv.scsp.keystorePass=12341234 es.caib.emiserv.scsp.custom.cert.validation.class=es.scsp.common.certificates.revocation.IgnoreRevocationManager es.caib.emiserv.scsp.periodo.validacion.certificados=24 es.caib.emiserv.scsp.tipoId=long es.caib.emiserv.scsp.prefijo.idtransmision=EMS es.caib.emiserv.scsp.version.datamodel.scsp=4.25.0 es.caib.emiserv.scsp.validate.nif.emisor.enabled=false es.caib.emiserv.scsp.polling.enabled=true es.caib.emiserv.scsp.task.polling.intervalo=1800 es.caib.emiserv.scsp.task.polling.espera=1000
